verses.text: \w In|strong="H1732"\w* you, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \nd Lord\nd*, I take refuge; let me never \w be|strong="H1732"\w* put \w to|strong="H1732"\w* shame. Rescue me \w in|strong="H1732"\w* \w your|strong="H1732"\w* faithfulness;

incline \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H5769"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* ear. \w Deliver|strong="H6403"\w* \w me|strong="H5769"\w* speedily. \w Be|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H5769"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* rock \w of|strong="H3068"\w* defence, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* fortified house, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* save \w me|strong="H5769"\w*.

\w For|strong="H1004"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w rock|strong="H6697"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w fortress|strong="H4581"\w* \w are|strong="H1004"\w* \w you|strong="H3467"\w*; lead \w me|strong="H5337"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* guide \w me|strong="H5337"\w* \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w your|strong="H5186"\w* name \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* honored.

Draw \w me|strong="H5148"\w* out \w of|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w net|strong="H4686"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* hid \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w me|strong="H5148"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* yourself \w are|strong="H8034"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* refuge.

\w Into|strong="H3318"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* hand \w I|strong="H3588"\w* commend \w my|strong="H3318"\w* spirit: \w you|strong="H3588"\w* ransom \w me|strong="H3318"\w*, \nd Lord\nd*, faithful God.
\w I|strong="H3027"\w* hate those devoted \w to|strong="H3068"\w* worthless idols; \w I|strong="H3027"\w* trust \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

\w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* rejoice \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* glad \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* love, \w because|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H8104"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w looked|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* misery, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* cared \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H8130"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* distress.

\w You|strong="H3045"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H3045"\w* \w given|strong="H8055"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w* \w into|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* enemy’s hand, \w you|strong="H3045"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* set \w my|strong="H7200"\w* feet \w in|strong="H5315"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* spacious place.

\w Be|strong="H3808"\w* gracious \w to|strong="H3027"\w* \w me|strong="H5975"\w*, \nd Lord\nd*, \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* am distressed; \w my|strong="H3027"\w* eye \w is|strong="H3027"\w* wasted away \w with|strong="H3027"\w* sorrow.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w consumed|strong="H6244"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w grief|strong="H3708"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* years \w with|strong="H3068"\w* sighing. \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w strength|strong="H5315"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* broken \w with|strong="H3068"\w* misery, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* bones waste \w away|strong="H6244"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* scorn \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w all|strong="H3615"\w* \w my|strong="H3615"\w* foes, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* butt \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w my|strong="H3615"\w* neighbors am \w I|strong="H3588"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* terror \w to|strong="H8141"\w* \w my|strong="H3615"\w* acquaintance. \w At|strong="H3782"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* sight \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w me|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* street people turn quickly \w away|strong="H3615"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* clean forgotten \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* dead, \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* ruined vessel.

\w I|strong="H3820"\w* hear \w the|strong="H1961"\w* whispers \w of|strong="H3627"\w* many – terror \w on|strong="H1961"\w* every side – scheming together against \w me|strong="H7911"\w*, plotting \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w take|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w life|strong="H4191"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* trust \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \nd Lord\nd*. “\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H7227"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* God,” \w I|strong="H3588"\w* say;

\w my|strong="H3068"\w* times \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* hand, save \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* hand \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* foes \w who|strong="H3068"\w* pursue \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w Make|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H3027"\w* face \w to|strong="H6256"\w* shine \w on|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H3027"\w* servant, \w save|strong="H5337"\w* \w me|strong="H7291"\w* \w in|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H3027"\w* love.

Put \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w not|strong="H6440"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H2617"\+w*\nd*, \w to|strong="H5921"\w* shame, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H5650"\w* called \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*. Let \w the|strong="H6440"\w* wicked \w be|strong="H5650"\w* put \w to|strong="H5921"\w* shame silent \w in|strong="H5921"\w* Sheol.

Strike \w the|strong="H3588"\w* false lips dumb, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* speak proudly \w against|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* righteous \w with|strong="H3068"\w* haughtiness \w and|strong="H3068"\w* contempt.

How great \w is|strong="H6662"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* goodness \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H8193"\w* treasured \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w those|strong="H5921"\w* \w who|strong="H6662"\w* fear \w you|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H1696"\w* wrought \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w those|strong="H5921"\w* \w who|strong="H6662"\w* take refuge \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* plain sight \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H5921"\w*!

\w In|strong="H7227"\w* \w your|strong="H4100"\w* sheltering wings \w you|strong="H4100"\w* \w hide|strong="H6845"\w* \w them|strong="H1121"\w* \w from|strong="H1121"\w* plottings \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w people|strong="H1121"\w*, \w you|strong="H4100"\w* \w keep|strong="H6845"\w* \w them|strong="H1121"\w* safe \w in|strong="H7227"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* bower \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3373"\w* chiding \w of|strong="H1121"\w* tongues.

Blest \w be|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \nd Lord\nd* \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* wonderful love \w he|strong="H6440"\w* \w has|strong="H7379"\w* shown \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w time|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* distress.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* said \w in|strong="H3068"\w* panic, “\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* driven \w clean|strong="H2617"\w* out \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* sight.” \w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w heard|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* plea, \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w cried|strong="H5892"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* help.

Love \w the|strong="H8085"\w* 
d Lord
d*, all \w you|strong="H5869"\w* faithful; \w the|strong="H8085"\w* 
d Lord
d* protects \w the|strong="H8085"\w* loyal, \w but|strong="H8085"\w* repays \w the|strong="H8085"\w* haughty \w in|strong="H8085"\w* full.

Let \w your|strong="H3068"\w* hearts \w be|strong="H3068"\w* courageous \w and|strong="H3068"\w* strong, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* wait \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
